page.title: 17EDUCATION,THE COMMUNITY.
page.content: The Community classes are run in the youth centre which is next to the school.There are classes for all ages groups. The community centre was built in 1963,and the class es where started because the surrounding people wanted the classes.Mr Ball runs all the classes and joins in with some of them .Mr Ball has a lot of help from the people who have school and the teachers.The community classes are mostly run in the evening,but a couple are run during the day for older people.Most of the people who use the community centre come for the Ramsey/Bury area. There are a great variety of classes offered both practical and intellectual,physical and spiritual.Despite increasing costs and educational cuts the Community Centre thrives and provides a much needed service to the area.
